00064 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start1 = "BIP/1.0";
00065 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start2 = "\r\n";
00066 const char* MsgSocket::tag_end = "\r\n";
00067 const char* MsgSocket::tag_str = "BIP/1.0 %08x %08x %08x\r\n";
00068 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_hdr = "BIP/1.0                   %08x\r\n";
00069 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_serv = "%08x %08x";
00070 
00071 const int MsgSocket::pid_size = 8;
00072 const int MsgSocket::mid_size = 8;
00073 const int MsgSocket::len_size = 8;
00074 
00075 
00076 const int MsgSocket::tag_end_size = (const int)strlen(MsgSocket::tag_end);
00077 const int MsgSocket::tag_size = (const int)(strlen(tag_start1) + 1 + MsgSocket::pid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::mid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::len_size + strlen(tag_start2));

00136 MsgSocket::~MsgSocket()
00137 {
00138         // We do not wan to callback anything more...
00139         // Remove the list
00140         RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00141 
00142         Stop();
00143 
00144         if ( socket )
00145         {
00146                 socket->Close();
00147                 delete socket;
00148         }
00149 
00150         if( buffer )
00151         {
00152                 delete[] buffer;
00153                 buffer = NULL;
00154         }
00155         if( buffer_udp_send )
00156         {
00157                 delete[] buffer_udp_send;
00158                 buffer_udp_send = NULL;
00159         }
00160         if( start_tag ) 
00161         {
00162                 delete[] start_tag;
00163                 start_tag = NULL;
00164         }
00165         if ( SendBuffer )
00166         {
00167                 delete [] SendBuffer;
00168                 SendBuffer = NULL;
00169         }
00170 }

00186 bool MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData( SimpleString DataForSL )
00187 {
00188         if ( DataForSL.GetLength() <= 0 )
00189                 return false;
00190 
00191         protectSend.EnterMutex();
00192 
00193         if ( receivedSyncLinkMsg == true || sendSyncLinkMsg == true )
00194         {
00195                 // TOO LATE
00196 #ifdef DEBUG
00197                 if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00198                 {
00199                         fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData: connexion already open. Can not set SyncLink data.\n" );
00200                 }
00201 #endif
00202                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00203                 return false;
00204         }
00205 
00206         // Copy data and set Length
00207         SyncLinkData = DataForSL;
00208 
00209         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00210         return true;
00211 }

00213 bool MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData( char* DataForSL, int DataLength )
00214 {
00215         if ( DataForSL == NULL || DataLength <= 0 )
00216                 return false;
00217 
00218         protectSend.EnterMutex();
00219 
00220         if ( PeerSyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00221         {
00222                 // TOO LATE
00223 #ifdef DEBUG
00224                 if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00225                 {
00226                         fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData: Peer SyncLink data already set.\n" );
00227                 }
00228 #endif
00229                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00230                 return false;
00231         }
00232 
00233         TemporaryMemoryBuffer Buffer( DataLength+1 );
00234         memcpy( (char*)Buffer, DataForSL, DataLength );
00235         ((char*)Buffer)[DataLength] = '\0';
00236 
00237         PeerSyncLinkData = Buffer;
00238 
00239         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00240         return true;
00241 }

00268 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip(char * buf, const char * data, int datalen)
00269 {
00270         char * Where;
00271 
00272         if ( buf == NULL || datalen > (TCP_BUFFER_SIZE -1 -tag_size -tag_end_size) )
00273         {
00274                 return -1;
00275         }
00276 
00277         // write the len of the buffer
00278         sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, datalen );
00279 
00280         // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00281         Where = buf + tag_size;
00282         // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00283         memmove( Where, data, datalen );
00284         // We need to write the end tag
00285         Where = Where + datalen;
00286         memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00287 
00288         return (tag_size + datalen + tag_end_size);
00289 }
00290 
00291 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg(char * buf, int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00292 {
00293         char * Where;
00294         int TotalLen;
00295         int i;
00296 
00297         if ( tab_length == NULL || tab_buf == NULL || nb_buf <= 0 )
00298         {
00299                 return -1;
00300         }
00301 
00302         // Compute the TotalLen of the Buffer
00303         TotalLen = 0;
00304         for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00305         {
00306                 TotalLen += tab_length[i];
00307         }
00308 
00309         if ( TotalLen > (TCP_BUFFER_SIZE -1 -tag_size -tag_end_size) )
00310         {
00311                 return -1;
00312         }
00313 
00314         // Ok, we have enougth space, start to fill the buffer
00315         // write the begining of the buffer and the len of the buffer
00316         sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, TotalLen );
00317 
00318         // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00319         Where = buf + tag_size;
00320 
00321         for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00322         {
00323                 // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00324                 memmove( Where, tab_buf[i], tab_length[i] );
00325 
00326                 // We need to move up to the end of this new part
00327                 Where += tab_length[i];
00328         }
00329 
00330         // Now, we put the enbd of the BIP message
00331         memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00332 
00333         // We compute the len of the full message
00334         return (tag_size + TotalLen + tag_end_size);
00335 }
00336 
00337 
00338 int MsgSocket::WriteHeaderForBip(char * buf, int service_id, int message_id )
00339 {
00340         char * Where;
00341 
00342         if ( buf == NULL )
00343         {
00344                 return -1;
00345         }
00346 
00347         Where = buf + strlen(tag_start1) + 1; // Just skip 'BIP/1.0 '
00348         // Print service ID and packet number
00349         sprintf( Where, tag_prepared_serv, service_id, message_id );
00350         // replace the '\0' from the previous printf to the old value : ' '
00351         Where[8+8+1] = ' ';
00352 
00353         return 0;
00354 }

00357 void MsgSocket::InitForTcpClient(const SimpleString addr, int port)
00358 {
00359         socket->Connect(addr, port);
00360         bufferSize = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE;
00361         buffer = new unsigned char[bufferSize];
00362         if ( buffer == NULL )
00363         {
00364                 throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00365         }
00366         SendBuffer = new unsigned char[TCP_BUFFER_SIZE];
00367         if ( SendBuffer == NULL )
00368         {
00369                 throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00370         }
00371         start_tag = new char[tag_size+1];
00372         if ( start_tag == NULL )
00373         {
00374                 throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00375         }
00376         kind = TCP_CLIENT_KIND;
00377         connected = true;
00378         occupiedSize = 0;
00379 }

00408 bool MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00409 {
00410         // lock the list
00411         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00412 
00413         // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00414         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00415         {
00416                 if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00417                 {
00418                         // unlock the list
00419                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00420 
00421                         // Could not add trice the same listener
00422                         return false;
00423                 }
00424         }
00425 
00426         // Add the listener
00427         CallbackObjects.Add( CallbackObject );
00428 
00429         // unlock the list
00430         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00431 
00432         return true;
00433 }
00434 
00435 
00439 bool MsgSocket::RemoveCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00440 {
00441         // lock the list
00442         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00443 
00444         // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00445         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00446         {
00447                 if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00448                 {
00449                         // Found ! Remove it
00450                         CallbackObjects.RemoveCurrent();
00451 
00452                         // unlock the list
00453                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00454 
00455                         // ok, we remove it
00456                         return true;
00457                 }
00458         }
00459 
00460         // unlock the list
00461         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00462 
00463         // We did not find it
00464         return false;
00465 }
00466 
00467 void MsgSocket::RemoveAllCallbackObjects()
00468 {
00469         // lock the list
00470         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00471 
00472         // Empty the list
00473         CallbackObjects.Empty();
00474 
00475         // unlock the list
00476         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00477 }

00479 void MsgSocket::SetCallbackSyncLink(Callback_SyncLink cr, void* user_data1, void* user_data2)
00480 {
00481         mutex.EnterMutex();
00482 
00483         callbackSyncLinkFct = cr;
00484 
00485         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = 0;
00486         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer = NULL;
00487         callbackSyncLinkData.userData1 = user_data1;
00488         callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 = user_data2;
00489 
00490         mutex.LeaveMutex();
00491 }
00492 
00493 bool MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg()
00494 {
00495         int TotalLen;
00496 
00497         protectSend.EnterMutex();
00498 
00499         if ( SyncLinkMsgSent() )
00500         {
00501 #ifdef DEBUG
00502                 if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00503                 {
00504                         fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: warning SyncLinkMsg already sent.\n" );
00505                 }
00506 #endif
00507                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00508                 return false;
00509         }
00510 
00511         if ( message_id != 0 )
00512         {
00513                 fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0 not %u.\n", message_id );
00514                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00515                 throw SocketException( "MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0." );
00516         }
00517 
00518         try
00519         {
00520                 if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00521                 {
00522                         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, (const char*)SyncLinkData.GetStr(), SyncLinkData.GetLength() );
00523                 }
00524                 else
00525                 {
00526                         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, "", 0 );
00527                 }
00528                 if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00529                 {
00530                         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00531                         return false;
00532                 }
00533 
00534                 // We complete the header with a message id = 0
00535                 WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00536 
00537                 message_id++;
00538 
00539 #ifdef DEBUG
00540                 if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00541                 {
00542                         SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
00543                         fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
00544                 }
00545 #endif
00546 
00547                 if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00548                 {
00549                         TotalLen = -1;
00550                 }
00551 
00552                 sendSyncLinkMsg = true;
00553                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00554 
00555                 return (TotalLen > 0);
00556         }
00557         catch(SocketException& e)
00558         {
00559                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00560                 if ( connected )
00561                 {
00562                         // Send disconnected message
00563                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00564                         // Send info to all listener
00565                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00566                         {
00567                                 try
00568                                 {
00569                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00570                                 }
00571                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it 
00572                         }
00573                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00574                         connected = false;
00575                 }
00576                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00577                 return false;
00578         }
00579 }
00580 
00581 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE MsgSocket::Run()
00582 {
00583         switch (kind)
00584         {
00585         case TCP_SERVER_KIND:
00586                 while(connected && !StopPending())
00587                 {
00588                         //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_server loop\n");
00589                         AcceptConnection();
00590                 }
00591                 break;
00592 
00593         case TCP_CLIENT_KIND:
00594                 while(connected && !StopPending())
00595                 {
00596                         //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_client loop\n");
00597                         Receive();
00598                 }
00599                 break;
00600 
00601         case UDP_EXCHANGE_KIND:
00602                 while(connected && !StopPending())
00603                 {
00604                         ReceiveUdpExchange();
00605                 }
00606                 break;
00607 
00608         default:
00609                 OmiscidError( "run : unknown type of connection\n");
00610                 break;
00611         }
00612 }
00613 
00614 void MsgSocket::Stop()
00615 {
00616         if ( connected )
00617         {
00618                 // Send disconnected message
00619                 CallbackObjects.Lock();
00620                 // Send info to all listener
00621                 for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00622                 {
00623                         try
00624                         {
00625                                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00626                         }
00627                         catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00628                 }
00629                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00630                 connected = false;
00631         }
00632         Thread::StopThread();
00633 }
00634 
00635 void MsgSocket::Receive()
00636 {
00637         try
00638         {
00639                 if(socket->Select())
00640                 {
00641                         int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize));
00642                         // OmiscidTrace( "%d %d \n ",nb_read, occupiedSize);
00643                         if(nb_read == 0)            
00644                         {
00645                                 if ( connected )
00646                                 {
00647                                         // Send disconnected message
00648                                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00649                                         // Send info to all listener
00650                                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00651                                         {
00652                                                 try
00653                                                 {
00654                                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00655                                                 }
00656                                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00657                                         }
00658                                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00659                                         connected = false;
00660                                 }
00661                                 return ;
00662                         }
00663                         occupiedSize += nb_read;
00664 
00665                         // For printing stuff...
00666                         buffer[occupiedSize] = '\0';
00667 
00668                         bool stop = false;
00669                         unsigned int length_msg, pid, mid;
00670                         int length_header;
00671 
00672                         int offset = 0;
00673                         int size = occupiedSize;
00674                         while(!stop)
00675                         {
00676                                 length_msg = pid = mid = 0;
00677                                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
00678                                 {
00679                                         //cerr << "good beginning ";
00680                                         //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
00681                                         //cerr << endl;
00682                                         if ( mid == 0 )
00683                                         {
00684 #ifdef DEBUG
00685                                                 if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00686                                                 {
00687                                                         // buffer[offset+offset+length_msg+tag_size] = '\0';
00688                                                         fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Receive: %s\n", buffer+offset );
00689                                                 }
00690 #endif
00691                                                 peer_pid = pid;
00692 
00693                                                 mutex.EnterMutex();
00694                                                 if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00695                                                 {
00696                                                         *(buffer+offset+tag_size+length_msg)='\0';
00697                                                         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00698                                                         if ( length_msg != 0 )
00699                                                         {
00700                                                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)buffer+offset+tag_size;
00701                                                         }
00702                                                         else
00703                                                         {
00704                                                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  NULL;
00705                                                         }
00706                                                         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00707                                                         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.pid = pid;
00708                                                         callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.mid = mid;
00709                                                         try
00710                                                         {
00711                                                                 (*callbackSyncLinkFct)( &callbackSyncLinkData, this );
00712                                                         }
00713                                                         catch( SocketException& e )
00714                                                         {
00715                                                                 mutex.LeaveMutex();
00716                                                                 throw e;
00717                                                         }
00718                                                 }
00719                                                 mutex.LeaveMutex();
00720 
00721                                                 //std::cout << "Link connexion Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00722                                                 receivedSyncLinkMsg = true;
00723                                                 if( SyncLinkMsgSent() == false )
00724                                                 {
00725                                                         SendSyncLinkMsg();
00726                                                 }
00727 
00728                                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00729                                                 {
00730                                                         SetPeerSyncLinkData( (char*)(buffer+offset+length_header), length_msg );
00731                                                 }
00732 
00733                                                 // Let's say we have a new connected peer
00734                                                 CallbackObjects.Lock();
00735                                                 // Send info to all listener
00736                                                 for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00737                                                 {
00738                                                         try
00739                                                         {
00740                                                                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Connected(*this,pid);
00741                                                         }
00742                                                         catch(SocketException& e)
00743                                                         {
00744                                                                 // Unlock the list
00745                                                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00746 
00747                                                                 // Thow the exception
00748                                                                 throw e;
00749                                                         }
00750                                                 }
00751                                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00752 
00753                                                 offset += length_header + tag_end_size;
00754                                                 size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00755 
00756                                                 // Ok, we have someone connected
00757                                         }
00758                                         //                                      else if(length_msg == 0)
00759                                         //                                      {                     
00760                                         //                                              //std::cout << "Empty Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00761                                         //                                              offset += length_header;
00762                                         //                                              size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00763                                         //                                      }
00764                                         else if((unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size)
00765                                         {
00766                                                 // OmiscidTrace( "wait more byte\n");
00767                                                 int total = (int)(length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size);
00768                                                 if ( total >= bufferSize )
00769                                                 {
00770                                                         OmiscidTrace( "buffer too small : new buffer allocation\n");
00771                                                         //allocation new buffer
00772                                                         bufferSize = (total+1023)&~1023; // bufferSize = total arrondi au kilo d'octet superieur
00773                                                         unsigned char* tmp_buffer = new unsigned char[bufferSize];
00774                                                         if(tmp_buffer)
00775                                                         {
00776                                                                 memcpy(tmp_buffer, buffer+offset, size*sizeof(unsigned char));
00777                                                                 offset = 0;
00778                                                                 occupiedSize = size;
00779                                                                 delete[] buffer;
00780                                                                 buffer = tmp_buffer;
00781                                                         }                        
00782                                                 }
00783                                                 stop = true;
00784                                         }
00785                                         else
00786                                         {
00787                                                 offset += length_header;
00788 
00789                                                 unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
00790 
00791                                                 //verif end tag              
00792                                                 if( memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
00793                                                 {
00794                                                         OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
00795                                                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00796                                                 }
00797                                                 else
00798                                                 {
00799                                                         offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
00800                                                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00801 #ifdef DEBUG
00802                                                         if ( Debug & DBG_RECV )
00803                                                         {
00804                                                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00805                                                                 {
00806                                                                         SimpleString SFormat = "MsgSocket::Recv: %";
00807                                                                         SFormat += length_msg;
00808                                                                         SFormat += ".";
00809                                                                         SFormat += length_msg;
00810                                                                         SFormat += "s\n";
00811                                                                         fprintf( stderr, SFormat.GetStr(), msgptr );
00812                                                                 }
00813                                                                 else
00814                                                                 {
00815                                                                         fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Recv: <empty>\n" );
00816                                                                 }
00817                                                         }
00818 #endif
00819                                                         // Send info to all receiver
00820                                                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00821                                                         if ( CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
00822                                                         {
00823                                                                 // Prepare data
00824                                                                 *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
00825                                                                 callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00826                                                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00827                                                                 {
00828                                                                         callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
00829                                                                 }
00830                                                                 else
00831                                                                 {
00832                                                                         callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)NULL;
00833                                                                 }
00834                                                                 callbackData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00835                                                                 callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
00836                                                                 callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
00837 
00838                                                                 // Send info to all listener
00839                                                                 for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00840                                                                 {
00841                                                                         try
00842                                                                         {
00843                                                                                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
00844                                                                         }
00845                                                                         catch(SocketException& e)
00846                                                                         {
00847                                                                                 // Unlock the list
00848                                                                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00849 
00850                                                                                 // Throw the exception
00851                                                                                 throw e;
00852                                                                         }
00853                                                                 }
00854                                                         }
00855                                                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00856                                                 }                         
00857                                         }
00858                                 }
00859                                 else
00860                                 {
00861                                         //cerr << "Decalage\n";
00862                                         int dec;
00863                                         if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
00864                                         {
00865                                                 stop = true;
00866                                                 size -= dec;
00867                                                 offset += dec;
00868                                         }
00869                                         else
00870                                         {
00871                                                 offset += dec;
00872                                                 size -= dec;
00873                                         }
00874                                 }
00875                         }
00876                         occupiedSize = size;
00877                         if ( occupiedSize != 0 )
00878                         {
00879                                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
00880                         }
00881                 }
00882         }
00883         catch(SocketException& e)
00884         {
00885                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00886                 if ( connected )
00887                 {
00888                         // Send disconnected message
00889                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00890                         // Send info to all listener
00891                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00892                         {
00893                                 try
00894                                 {
00895                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00896                                 }
00897                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard
00898                         }
00899                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00900                         connected = false;
00901                 }
00902         }
00903 }

00908         Socket* sock = socket->Accept();
00909         if(sock)
00910         {
00911                 AcceptConnection(new MsgSocket(sock));      
00912         }

00921 
00922 int MsgSocket::Send(int len, const char* buf)
00923 {
00924         int TotalLen;
00925 
00926         if(len > maxMessageSizeForTCP)
00927         {
00928                 OmiscidTrace( "Message too big for TCP size=%d,  sizemax=%d\n", len, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
00929                 throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for TCP");
00930         }
00931 
00932         protectSend.EnterMutex();
00933         try
00934         {
00935                 TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, buf, len );
00936                 if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00937                 {
00938                         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00939                         return -1;
00940                 }
00941 
00942                 // We complete the header
00943                 WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00944 
00945                 // Increase the number for the next message
00946                 message_id++;
00947 
00948                 if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00949                 {
00950                         TotalLen = -1;
00951                 }
00952 
00953 #ifdef DEBUG
00954                 if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
00955                 {
00956                         SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
00957                         fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Send: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
00958                 }
00959 #endif
00960 
00961                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00962                 return TotalLen;
00963         }
00964         catch(SocketException& e)
00965         {
00966                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00967                 if ( connected )
00968                 {
00969                         // Send disconnected message
00970                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00971                         // Send info to all listener
00972                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00973                         {
00974                                 try
00975                                 {
00976                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00977                                 }
00978                                 catch(SocketException&) {}      // Discard it...
00979                         }
00980                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00981                         connected = false;
00982                 }
00983                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00984                 return -1;
00985         }
00986 }
00987 
00988 int MsgSocket::SendCuttedMsg(int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00989 {
00990         int TotalLen;
00991 
00992         protectSend.EnterMutex();
00993         try
00994         {
00995                 TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg( (char*)SendBuffer, tab_length, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00996                 if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00997                 {
00998                         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00999                         return -1;
01000                 }
01001                 // We complete the header
01002                 WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
01003 
01004 #ifdef DEBUG
01005                 if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01006                 {
01007                         OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", SendBuffer );
01008                 }
01009 #endif
01010 
01011                 // Increase the number for the next message
01012                 ++message_id;
01013 
01014                 if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
01015                 {
01016                         TotalLen = -1;
01017                 }
01018                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01019                 return TotalLen;
01020         }
01021         catch(SocketException& e)
01022         {
01023                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01024                 if ( connected )
01025                 {
01026                         // Send disconnected message
01027                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
01028                         // Send info to all listener
01029                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01030                         {
01031                                 try
01032                                 {
01033                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01034                                 }
01035                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01036                         }
01037                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01038                         connected = false;      
01039                 }
01040                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01041                 return -1;
01042         }
01043 }
01044 
01045 int MsgSocket::	SendPreparedBuffer(int len, char* l_buffer)
01046 {
01047         if(l_buffer == NULL)
01048         {
01049                 OmiscidError( "SendPreparedBuffer : NULL mesg\n" );
01050                 throw MsgSocketException("Message NULL for TCP");
01051         }
01052 
01053         if(len > maxMessageSizeForTCP)
01054         {
01055                 OmiscidError( "Message too big for TCP size=%d,  sizemax=%d\n", len, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
01056                 throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for TCP");
01057         }
01058 
01059         protectSend.EnterMutex();
01060         try
01061         {
01062                 // Here we've got a full buffer and we can (must) write our header at the in at the beginning !
01063                 WriteHeaderForBip(l_buffer, service_id, message_id );
01064 #ifdef DEBUG
01065                 if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01066                 {
01067                         OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", l_buffer );
01068                 }
01069 #endif
01070 
01071                 message_id++;
01072 
01073                 //socket->Send(strlen(start_tag), start_tag);
01074                 int res;
01075                 if((res = socket->Send(len, l_buffer)) != -1) 
01076                 {
01077                         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01078                         return res;             
01079                 }       
01080                 OmiscidTrace( "Erreur Send (-1)\n" );
01081                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01082                 return -1;
01083 
01084         }
01085         catch(SocketException& e)
01086         {
01087                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01088                 if ( connected )
01089                 {
01090                         // Send disconnected message
01091                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
01092                         // Send info to all listener
01093                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01094                         {
01095                                 try
01096                                 {
01097                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01098                                 }
01099                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01100                         }
01101                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01102                         connected = false;
01103                 }
01104                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01105                 return -1;
01106         }
01107 }

01110 int MsgSocket::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, UdpConnection* dest)
01111 {
01112         //   OmiscidTrace( "in MsgSocket::SendTo\n");
01113         //   OmiscidTrace( "send to pid : %u\n", dest->pid);
01114         if(len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE){
01115                 OmiscidError( "Message too big for UDP size=%d,  sizemax=%d\n", len, UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE);
01116                 throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for UDP");
01117         }
01118 
01119         protectSend.EnterMutex();
01120         if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01121         {
01122                 buffer_udp_send = new char[2048];
01123                 if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01124                 {
01125                         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01126                         return 0;
01127                 }
01128         }
01129         try
01130         {
01131                 struct sockaddr_in* destptr = &(dest->addr);
01132 
01133                 unsigned int total = tag_size+len+tag_end_size;
01134 
01135                 sprintf(buffer_udp_send, tag_str, service_id, message_id, len);
01136                 ++message_id;
01137                 sprintf((buffer_udp_send+total-tag_end_size), tag_end);
01138                 memcpy(buffer_udp_send+tag_size, buf, len);
01139 
01140                 int TotalLen = socket->SendTo(total, buffer_udp_send, destptr);
01141                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01142                 return TotalLen;
01143 
01144                 //      socket->SendTo(strlen(start_tag), start_tag, destptr);      
01145                 //      socket->SendTo(len, buf, destptr);      
01146                 //      socket->SendTo(tag_end_size, tag_end, destptr);
01147 
01148         }
01149         catch(SocketException& e)
01150         {
01151                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d \n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01152                 if ( connected )
01153                 {
01154                         // Send disconnected message
01155                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
01156                         // Send info to all listener
01157                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01158                         {
01159                                 try
01160                                 {
01161                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01162                                 }
01163                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01164                         }
01165                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01166                         connected = false;      
01167                 }
01168                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01169                 return -1;
01170         }
01171 }

01175 int MsgSocket::GoodBeginning(unsigned char* buf, int len, unsigned int& lengthmsg, unsigned int& pid, unsigned int& mid)
01176 {
01177         if(len < tag_size)
01178         {
01179                 //cerr << "longueur insuffisante\n";
01180                 return 0;
01181         }
01182         else
01183         {          
01184                 if(sscanf((char*)buf, tag_str, &pid, &mid, &lengthmsg) != 3)
01185                 {
01186                         //cerr << "different\n";
01187                         return 0;
01188                 }
01189                 else
01190                 {       
01191                         return tag_size;
01192                 }
01193         }
01194 }
01195 
01196 bool MsgSocket::MoveToMessage(unsigned char* buf, int len, int& decal)
01197 {
01198         if(len < tag_size)
01199         {
01200                 decal = 0;
01201                 return false;
01202         }
01203         else
01204         {
01205                 int i =0;
01206                 while(i < len - tag_size 
01207                         && (memcmp(tag_start1, (buf+i), strlen(tag_start1))) 
01208                         /*&& (memcmp(tag_start2, (buf+i+tag_size-2), strlen(tag_start2)))*/)
01209                 {
01210                         ++i;
01211                 }
01212                 decal = i;
01213                 return (i != len - tag_size);
01214         }
01215 }

01221         if(msg_empty)
01222         {
01223                 OmiscidTrace( "[Empty Msg]\n");
01224         }
01225         OmiscidTrace( "\n");
01226         return NULL;

01228 
01229 void MsgSocket::ReceiveUdpExchange()
01230 {
01231         try
01232         {
01233                 if(socket->Select())
01234                 {
01235 
01236                         //std::cerr << "in ReceiveUdpServer\n";   
01237                         int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize), &udpConnection.addr);
01238                         //std::cerr << "nb_read=" << nb_read <<"\n";
01239                         if(nb_read == 0)
01240                         {
01241                                 return ;
01242                         }
01243 
01244                         UdpConnection* connection = NULL; 
01245 
01246                         occupiedSize += nb_read;
01247 
01248                         bool stop = false;
01249                         unsigned int length_msg;
01250                         int length_header;
01251                         int offset = 0;
01252                         int size = occupiedSize;
01253                         unsigned int pid, mid;
01254                         while(!stop)
01255                         {
01256                                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
01257                                 {
01258                                         //cerr << "good beginning ";
01259                                         //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
01260                                         //cerr << endl;
01261                                         udpConnection.pid = pid;
01262                                         // REVIEW a changer pour UDP
01263                                         //        if(mid == 0)
01264                                         //          {
01265                                         //            peer_pid = pid;                                 
01266                                         //            offset += length_header;                
01267                                         //            connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, true);
01268                                         //          }
01269                                         //        else
01270                                         if((unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size)
01271                                         {
01272                                                 stop = true;
01273                                         }                                
01274                                         else
01275                                         {
01276                                                 connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, false);
01277                                                 offset += length_header;
01278                                                 unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
01279 
01280 
01281                                                 //verif end tag              
01282                                                 if(memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
01283                                                 {
01284                                                         OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
01285                                                         //ignore message, search for new header after the detected header
01286                                                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01287                                                 }
01288                                                 else
01289                                                 { 
01290                                                         offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
01291                                                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01292                                                         if(length_msg != 0)                                       
01293                                                         {
01294                                                                 CallbackObjects.Lock();
01295                                                                 if( connection && CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
01296                                                                 {
01297                                                                         *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
01298                                                                         callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
01299                                                                         callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
01300                                                                         callbackData.Msg.origine = FromUDP;
01301                                                                         callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
01302                                                                         callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
01303                                                                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01304                                                                         {
01305                                                                                 try
01306                                                                                 {
01307                                                                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
01308                                                                                 }
01309                                                                                 catch(SocketException& e)
01310                                                                                 {
01311                                                                                         // Unlock the list
01312                                                                                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01313 
01314                                                                                         // Throw the exception
01315                                                                                         throw e;
01316                                                                                 }
01317                                                                         }
01318                                                                 }
01319                                                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01320                                                         }
01321 
01322                                                 }
01323                                         }
01324                                 }
01325                                 else
01326                                 {
01327                                         //cerr << "Decalage\n";
01328                                         int dec;
01329                                         if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
01330                                         {
01331                                                 stop = true;
01332                                                 size -= dec;
01333                                                 offset += dec;
01334                                         }
01335                                         else
01336                                         {
01337                                                 offset += dec;
01338                                                 size -= dec;
01339                                         }
01340                                 }
01341                         }
01342                         occupiedSize = size;
01343                         if ( occupiedSize != 0 )
01344                         {
01345                                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
01346                         }
01347                 }
01348         }
01349         catch(SocketException& e)
01350         {
01351                 OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01352                 if ( connected )
01353                 {
01354                         // Send disconnected message
01355                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
01356                         // Send info to all listener
01357                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01358                         {
01359                                 try
01360                                 {
01361                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01362                                 }
01363                                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01364                         }
01365                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01366                         connected = false;
01367                 }
01368         }
01369 }

01411 bool MsgSocket::ReceivedSyncLinkMsg()

01425 bool MsgSocket::WaitSyncLinkMsg(unsigned int TimeToWait/* = 250 */)
01426 {
01427         ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
01428         while( connected == true )
01429         {
01430                 if ( ReceivedSyncLinkMsg() || CountWaitedTime.Get() >= TimeToWait )
01431                 {
01432                         return true;
01433                 }
01434                 Thread::Sleep(10);
01435         }
01436         return false;
01437 }

01448 
01449 void MsgSocket::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
01450 {
01451         if ( max <= 0 )
01452                 return;
01453 
01454         if ( max > TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1 )
01455         {
01456                 maxMessageSizeForTCP = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1;
01457         }
01458         else
01459         {
01460                 maxMessageSizeForTCP = max;
01461         }
01462         maxBIPMessageSize = maxMessageSizeForTCP - tag_size - tag_end_size;
01463 }

01466 {
01467         return peer_pid == peer_id; 
01468 }
